name: XLAB
summary:
XLAB Steampunk, a service by XLAB, specializes in IT automation with Ansible.                                                 
XLAB is a global IT solution company focused on remote desktop, management and automation of hybrid infrastructure, and data analytics, building on breakthroughs of its own research team. Since 2001, and in a team of 100+, XLAB has become recognized as a highly professional technology innovator, betting on the power of open source, open exchange of ideas, and teamwork.
